payload.content: Voicebox is a local-first voice cloning studio with DAW-like features for professional voice synthesis, serving as a local, free, and open-source alternative to cloud services like ElevenLabs.

name: Voicebox is a local-first voice cloning studio with DAW-like features for profes
content: Voicebox is a local-first voice cloning studio with DAW-like features for professional voice synthesis, serving as a local, free, and open-source alternative to cloud services like ElevenLabs.

payload.content: Voicebox offers complete privacy, professional tools, and native performance by allowing users to download models, clone voices, and generate speech entirely on their machine, unlike cloud services that lock voice data behind subscriptions.

name: Voicebox offers complete privacy, professional tools, and native performance by
content: Voicebox offers complete privacy, professional tools, and native performance by allowing users to download models, clone voices, and generate speech entirely on their machine, unlike cloud services that lock voice data behind subscriptions.

payload.content: Voicebox enables users to clone any voice from a few seconds of audio and compose multi-voice projects using studio-grade editing tools.

name: Voicebox enables users to clone any voice from a few seconds of audio and compos
content: Voicebox enables users to clone any voice from a few seconds of audio and compose multi-voice projects using studio-grade editing tools.

payload.content: Voicebox is optimized for performance with Metal acceleration on Mac and CUDA acceleration on Windows/Linux for fast, local inference.

name: Voicebox is optimized for performance with Metal acceleration on Mac and CUDA ac
content: Voicebox is optimized for performance with Metal acceleration on Mac and CUDA acceleration on Windows/Linux for fast, local inference.

payload.content: Voicebox does not require a Python installation.

name: Voicebox does not require a Python installation.
content: Voicebox does not require a Python installation.

payload.content: Voicebox achieves near-perfect voice cloning powered by Alibaba's Qwen3-TTS model.

name: Voicebox achieves near-perfect voice cloning powered by Alibaba's Qwen3-TTS mode
content: Voicebox achieves near-perfect voice cloning powered by Alibaba's Qwen3-TTS model.

payload.content: The Stories Editor in Voicebox allows users to create multi-voice narratives using a timeline-based editor to arrange tracks, trim clips, and mix conversations.

name: The Stories Editor in Voicebox allows users to create multi-voice narratives usi
content: The Stories Editor in Voicebox allows users to create multi-voice narratives using a timeline-based editor to arrange tracks, trim clips, and mix conversations.

payload.content: Voicebox supports combining multiple voice samples to achieve higher quality and more natural-sounding results.

name: Voicebox supports combining multiple voice samples to achieve higher quality and
content: Voicebox supports combining multiple voice samples to achieve higher quality and more natural-sounding results.

payload.content: Voicebox allows users to run GPU inference locally or connect to a remote machine with a one-click server setup.

name: Voicebox allows users to run GPU inference locally or connect to a remote machin
content: Voicebox allows users to run GPU inference locally or connect to a remote machine with a one-click server setup.

payload.content: Voicebox uses Whisper for audio transcription, enabling accurate speech-to-text and automatic extraction of reference text from voice samples.

name: Voicebox uses Whisper for audio transcription, enabling accurate speech-to-text
content: Voicebox uses Whisper for audio transcription, enabling accurate speech-to-text and automatic extraction of reference text from voice samples.

payload.content: Voicebox is cross-platform, available for macOS, Windows, and Linux, and does not require a Python installation.

name: Voicebox is cross-platform, available for macOS, Windows, and Linux, and does no
content: Voicebox is cross-platform, available for macOS, Windows, and Linux, and does not require a Python installation.
